import React from'react';import"./services.css";import pb from'../../pocketbase';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Services=()=>{const[services,setServices]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchServices=async()=>{try{const records=await pb.collection('ServiceData').getFullList();// Append image URL to each record
const servicesWithUrls=records.map(record=>({id:record.id,title:record.title,description:record.description,image:pb.files.getURL(record,record.image),background:record.background}));setServices(servicesWithUrls);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching ServiceData:',error);}};fetchServices();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"services container section",id:"services",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section__title",children:"Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"services__container grid",children:services.map(_ref=>{let{id,image,title,description,background}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"services__card",style:{backgroundColor:background,boxShadow:"0px 5px 20px 0px ".concat(background)},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:title,className:"services__img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"services__title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"services__description",children:description})]},id);})})]});};export default Services;
